reviews.text: I booked this hotel via Hotwire and was quite disappointed when my "2 star" hotel was the Motel 8. I have had bad experiences with this chain in the past. I was, however, absolutely delighted with the service and cleanliness of this hotel. The staff, specifically the general manager, were very friendly. My hotel room was very clean and all of the furniture was well taken care of. The hotel entrance has a lobby that with coffee, a microwave, and a public computer.
reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
Unreliable reservation
reviews.text: While I have stayed at nicer hotels, for the value, this place rocks.

This was my second stay at the Super 8 in Cedar City. Both times I was very pleased. The room was very clean and had furnishings typical for this type of establishment. There was a working refrigerator and a TV with basic cable service. The mattress was ok, better than some I have slept on.
reviews.title: Nice motel for the price
Love the Jacuzzi Suite...
reviews.text: The best part of this Super 8 was the better than average free breakfast. There was the usual cold cereal and pastries, but there was also waffles, english muffins, and several choices of fruit juice. Terrible coffee though - I am not one who likes strong coffee (I can't stand Starbucks), but this coffee was too weak for even me - almost like drinking hot water.
Awesome price, service, and room size. For the reputation that Super 8 has, this is one of our favorite locations to visit and the price is a great deal. The size of the room is very large and clean.
reviews.title: Surprise for Super 8 Pride HOtel...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: First of all Manager was so co-operative and positive, Very clean, Good breakfast, easy to excess and free computer in waiting room...
reviews.title: Beyond Expectations

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: For the price I was not expecting much more than an uncomfortable bed and bath. Found much more. Room was very clean, beds comfortable. didn't use the free wi-fi but did use the free computer in the lobby. Breakfast area was a little small but this isn't a big fancy hotel. The food provided was fresh and area clean. Motorcycle friendly. Will surely stay here again.
reviews.title: Cheap, but suggest spending more

reviews.text: Location of motel is very easy to find. We injoyed the free breakfast, a varity of things to choose from including a make your own waffle station.. The staff was very helpful. Rooms were very clean, and we enjoyed having the free internet service in our room. Also it was nice to have the free business center to use in the lobby.
reviews.title: Happy with service, plan to stay again.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2009, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This motel is very conveniently located near Exit 59 and just a few blocks from the University where the Shakespear Festival is presented. We found the breakfasts better than adequate and well served. Our stay was enhanced by the available brochures and we were able to heat Marie Calenders in the room to save on some meals. The city is most enjoyable with lots of fun spots and food spots because of the university students who have needs on the week ends. We will plan to stay again at this location.
reviews.title: Gracious and over the top.

reviews.text: The manager is friendly, and the rooms are decent for the price, but a $6.24 unauthorized charge appeared on my credit card statement several days after my stay. After speaking with the manager, he insisted that the charge remain since it "was already done." This hotel not recommended due to poor customer service and sloppy billing practices.
reviews.title: Room was nice, but unauthorized charges appeared on my credit card

reviews.text: I can't believe that this was a Super 8 motel. My room was extremely clean--the carpet looked new and the bathroom was impeccably clean with new tiles. Also-the service was excellent. The family who runs it is efficient and very friendly. They also take pets for a reasonable fee of $12/night.
reviews.title: EXCELLENT value-extremely clean and friendly

reviews.text: I stayed one night in this Super 8 and was not disappointed. My room was on the 3rd floor and it was very clean. The front desk staff was helpful and friendly with dinner recommendations and directions around town. Breakfast included make-your-own waffles, juices, coffee, tea, cereals, bagels, fruit & toast. The location is right off of I-15 and next to a gas station/convenience store. I experienced a quiet night. I would stay here again.
reviews.title: Nice Stay in Cedar City

likes.liked: — Location. Contintental Breakfast. Good value for the money.
